entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 12:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: NE 24 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm over the Bay d'Espoir Highway area. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
